name: catalogo-retorno-fullstack
description: CatÃ¡logo Retorno - Backend API y Frontend Angular

scripts.install:all: cd api && npm install --include=dev && cd ../App && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:app
scripts.dev:concurrent: concurrently "cd api && npm run dev" "cd App && npm run start"
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build completado: API en api/dist y Frontend en App/dist'
